summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department; authorizing the Superintendent of City Light, or his designee, to execute a Release of Easement releasing three (3) easements for electrical distribution system purposes within Holly Park, High Point and Rainier Vista Subdivisions (PM\#240428-1-003, PM\#240325-2-001, and PM\#240416-4-005), which are surplus to the City's needs.
